name: getopt
purpose: Gets options from the command line argument list

return.description:
This function will return an array of option / argument pairs or FALSE on
   failure.The parsing of options will end at the first non-option found, anything
    that follows is discarded.

changelog.change: Added support for "=" as argument/value separator.
Added support for optional values (specified with "::").
This function is no longer system dependent and works on Windows too.
